mapper.insert: insert into member_tm_channel (open_member_id, member_id, real_name, mobile, status, lock_status, active_time, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update member_tm_channel set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lock_status = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active_time = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where open_member_id = #{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select open_member_id, member_id, real_name, mobile, status, lock_status, active_time, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from member_tm_channel where open_member_id = #{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select open_member_id, member_id, real_name, mobile, status, lock_status, active_time, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from member_tm_channel
